sentences.en: “Is this place for real? A wolf in a . . . leisure suit and a cow in a print dress wait patiently on the couch in the lobby”(&b{Teresa Carson})
sentences.cn: “这样的地方确实存在吗?一只穿着便装的狼和一头穿着印花服的奶牛耐心地坐在客厅的沙发上等待着”(&b{特雷萨·卡森})

sentences.en: A child may not differentiate between his imagination and the real world.
sentences.cn: 儿童可能无法将自己的幻想与真实世界区分开来。

sentences.en: a coat made of real fur
sentences.cn: 真皮大衣

sentences.en: a real live detective had been at the factory.
sentences.cn: 千真万确，一个侦探曾经在厂里呆过。

sentences.en: Art has real meaning when it helps people to understand themselves.
sentences.cn: 当艺术有助于人们了解自身的时候才有真正的意义。

sentences.en: At least they have a real chance to find work.
sentences.cn: 至少他们的确有找到工作的机会。

sentences.en: By his own admission, he evaded taxes as a Florida real-estate speculator.
sentences.cn: 他亲口承认自己在佛罗里达从事房地产投机生意时逃过税。

sentences.en: Does such an attitudinal change reflect real experiences in daily life?
sentences.cn: 人生观的这种转变是否反映了日常生活中的真实遭遇？

sentences.en: He was not listed under his real name on the residents panel.
sentences.cn: 他未以真名在居民名册上登记。

sentences.en: He'd put up a real fight to keep you there.
sentences.cn: 他曾努力争取让你留在那儿。

sentences.en: I never felt myself a real child of the sixties.
sentences.cn: 我从未觉得自己真是60年代的人。

sentences.en: I'm not playing games—this is for real!.
sentences.cn: 我并非在闹着玩——我是认真的！。

sentences.en: Michael Fish is my favourite. He's a hoot, a real character.
sentences.cn: 我最喜欢迈克尔·菲什。他滑稽逗趣，是个实实在在的人物。

sentences.en: She had never seen a real live elephant before.
sentences.cn: 她以前从未见过活生生的大象。

sentences.en: The object has no real value, materially or emotionally.
sentences.cn: 无论从物质还是情感上说，这个东西都一无是处。

sentences.en: The real danger is civil unrest in the east of the country.
sentences.cn: 真正的危险是该国东部地区的民众动乱。

sentences.en: The real purchasing power of the rouble has plummeted.
sentences.cn: 卢布的实际购买力骤然下降。

sentences.en: There is a real danger that the disease might spread.
sentences.cn: 这种疾病确实有蔓延的危险。

sentences.en: There is no real reason to worry.
sentences.cn: 没有什么真正的理由需要担心。

sentences.en: They were in a real jam, Bob thought glumly.
sentences.cn: 他们确实遇上麻烦了，鲍勃闷闷不乐地想。

sentences.en: Things don’t happen quite that easily in real life.
sentences.cn: 现实生活中不会动不动就有这样的事情发生。

sentences.en: We need to tackle the real problems of unemployment and poverty.
sentences.cn: 我们需要解决失业和贫穷这两个实际问题。

sentences.en: What they said was a real knock to my self-confidence.
sentences.cn: 他们的话是对我自信心的一次重大打击。

sentences.en: What we need is not manifestos of pious intentions, but real action.
sentences.cn: 我们需要的不是善意但难以实现的宣言，而是实际行动。

sentences.en: You want teens to have committed sexual relationships? Get real!.
sentences.cn: 你希望青少年之间有性关系？荒唐！。

sentences.en: you've never been in love before, so how can you be sure this is the real thing?.
sentences.cn: 你以前从来没谈过恋爱，所以你怎么肯定这是真的？。

words.tran_cn: 现实的；现实主义的；逼真的；实在论的
[数] 可实现的；可实行的；可感觉到的
实际上，事实上；真正地，真实地；真的吗？（表语气）
现实主义；实在论；现实主义的态度和行为
实现；认识到；了解；将某物卖得
实现（realize的过去式及过去分词）

phrases.tran_cn: (非正式)真正的，确实的；认真的
真正地，确实地：事实或现实确实如此地
(非正式，主北美)愚蠢！荒唐！可笑！（用来表示某个想法或说法的愚蠢性或过于理想化）
房地产管理；物业管理；不动产管理
房地产市场；不动产市场
现实生活（的）；实际生活（的）
(幽默)千真万确（尤用来强调惊人、不寻常的事情的真实性）
真正的男人（电视剧名称）；大丈夫

trans.tran_cn: 真的，真实的，实际的，名副其实的，严肃的，十足的
trans.tran_en: something that is real exists and is important
